unnormalised: **Social Media & Influencer Marketing: Are Your Insta Followers Ghosting You, Yaar?**
normalised: social media and influencer marketing are your insta followers ghosting you, yaar?

unnormalised: Mumbai, Oct 26 - Feeling like your meticulously curated Insta feed isn't hitting the mark? Turns out, follower analytics are getting a serious upgrade. Experts say that post-Diwali, around 09:00 hrs onwards on Nov 5th, social media platforms will be rolling out deeper dives into follower behavior.
normalised: Mumbai, october twenty six - Feeling like your meticulously curated Insta feed is not hitting the mark? Turns out, follower analytics are getting a serious upgrade. Experts say that post-Diwali, around nine o'clock hours onwards on november fifth, social media platforms will be rolling out deeper dives into follower behavior.

unnormalised: Think beyond just likes and comments. We're talking REAL engagement metrics – who's actually watching your stories till the end, which reels are getting re-shared, and if your carefully crafted caption is even being *read*.
normalised: Think beyond just likes and comments. We are talking real engagement metrics – who is actually watching your stories till the end, which reels are getting re-shared, and if your carefully crafted caption is even being read.

unnormalised: According to a report released on 15/08/2023 by IIM Bangalore’s Digital Marketing department, understanding these insights is crucial, especially for influencer marketing. Are those 100k followers real or just bots from Chandni Chowk? Find out!
normalised: According to a report released on fifteenth august two thousand and twenty three by I I M Bangalore's Digital Marketing department, understanding these insights is crucial, especially for influencer marketing. Are those one hundred thousand followers real or just bots from Chandni Chowk? Find out!

unnormalised: This means better ROI for brands, especially during the wedding season blitz! No more wasting Rs. 50,000 on an influencer whose audience isn't even in your target demographic (e.g., selling sarees to Gen Z gamers). Get ready to analyze like never before! Next big update expected on 31/12/2024!
